waste.name: Organic Waste
waste.description: Biodegradable waste originating from plants, animals, or food.

waste.name: Plastic Waste
waste.description: Non-biodegradable waste made from synthetic polymers like plastic bottles and bags.

waste.name: Paper Waste
waste.description: Discarded paper materials such as newspapers, cardboard, and office paper.

waste.name: Glass Waste
waste.description: Waste made of glass, including broken glassware and bottles.

waste.name: Metal Waste
waste.description: Discarded metal materials like aluminum cans, scrap iron, and steel items.
